title: Deposits in Mutual Savings Banks and Postal Savings System for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1867-1906 (2)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1907-1946 (3)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1947-1968. The Source Provides All Data Except For 1911-1946 Postal Savings Deposits And 1907-1946 Mutual Savings Banks Deposits. These Data Are From Unpublished NBER Files. Source: Friedman And Schwartz, A Monetary History Of The United States, 1867-1960, (NBER, 1963), Table A-1.

This NBER data series m14173a appears on the NBER website in Chapter 14 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter14.html.

NBER Indicator: m14173a
